mapper.select:
SELECT mushroom_growth_idx AS mushroomGrowthIdx , farm_data_idx AS farmDataIdx , crop_idx AS cropIdx , mushroom_growth_daily AS mushroomGrowDaily , mushroom_growth_status AS mushroomGrowStatus , mushroom_growth_date AS mushroomGrowDate , mushroom_growth_update AS mushroomGrowUpdate
FROM mushroom_growth
